    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerConfiguration

        public PlayerConfiguration​(boolean hitlerKnowsFascists,
                           int liberalCount,
                           int fascistCount)
        Create PlayerConfiguration instance. By default has spaces 4 and 5 on fascist board set to GameBoardEffect.KILL.
        Parameters:
        hitlerKnowsFascists - If hitler knows who the fascists are in the game.
        liberalCount - Amount of liberals that are in the game.
        fascistCount - Amount of fascists that are in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getPieceEffect

        public GameBoardEffect getPieceEffect​(int location)
        Get the effect for play the xth piece. If nothing happens then GameBoardEffect.NONE is returned.
        Parameters:
        location - Number of tile that is played.
        Returns:
        GameBoardEffect that has to take effect at that spot

      • addGameEffect

        public boolean addGameEffect​(int location,
                             GameBoardEffect effect)
        Add game effect for placing card on the xth location.
        Parameters:
        location - Where the effect will take place.
        effect - What the effect will be.
        Returns:
        false if location already has an effect. true if effect was added.

        public boolean hitlerKnowsFascists()
